cryptographic_compliance.description: SHA1 replaced with SHA256/SHA512 in evidence packager
cryptographic_compliance.compliance_impact: Eliminates weak cryptographic algorithms for DFARS 252.204-7012

path_traversal_prevention.description: Comprehensive path validation and sanitization system deployed
path_traversal_prevention.compliance_impact: Prevents directory traversal attacks and validates file access patterns

audit_trail_enhancement.compliance_impact: Provides 7-year audit retention with integrity verification for DFARS compliance

compliance_automation.compliance_impact: Automated validation and reporting for continuous DFARS compliance monitoring
